# Overview

This is Take-home Exercise 1 about observation from a survey dataset of northern mountainous regions in Vietnam. The survey is about income of informal labourers in rural areas.

# Getting Start

```{r}
pacman::p_load(dplyr, skimr, ggdist, ggridges, ggthemes, colorspace, tidyverse)
```

# Importing Data

```{r}
survey <- read_excel("C:/Users/jiayi/Documents/SMU/26 Jan Term/ISSS608_Visual_Analytics_and_Applications/ISSS608_Lwn0170/data/TE01_data.xlsx")
```

# Cleaning Data

```{r}
str(survey)
skim(survey)
summary(survey)
```
